entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022
